Post.title: QTableWidget
Post._content:
QTableWidget
<!--more-->

```c++
QTableWidget *FilePageHandle = new QTableWidget();
int lineCnt = 0;    //,
int columnCnt = 6;  //
QStringList columID = {"" , "" , "" , "(ms)" , "AutoLock", ""};  //
ui->FilePageHandle->setColumnCount(columnCnt);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->setRowCount(lineCnt);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(columID);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->verticalHeader()->setVisible(false); // header
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(false); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::DoubleClicked);  //
/*  */
ui->FilePageHandle->setColumnWidth(0,200); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setFont(QFont("Helvetica"));  //
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setFixedHeight(30);//
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setStyleSheet("QHeaderView::section{background:white;color:black;}");  //
/*  */
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalScrollBar()->setStyleSheet(
	 "QScrollBar:horizontal{background:#DADADA;height:25px;margin-left:25px;margin-right:25px }"
	 "QScrollBar::handle:horizontal{background:lightgray;min-height:80px;height:25px}"
	 "QScrollBar::sub-line:horizontal{width:25px;subcontrol-position:left;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 "QScrollBar::add-line:horizontal{width:25px;subcontrol-position:right;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 );
ui->FilePageHandle->verticalScrollBar()->setStyleSheet(
	 "QScrollBar{background:#DADADA;width:25px;margin-top:25px;margin-bottom:25px}"
	 "QScrollBar::handle:vertical{background:lightgray;min-height:80px;width:25px}"
	 "QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical{height:25px;subcontrol-position:top;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 "QScrollBar::add-line:vertical{height:25px;subcontrol-position:bottom;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 );
```

QTableWidget
<!--more-->

```c++
QTableWidget *FilePageHandle = new QTableWidget();
int lineCnt = 0;    //,
int columnCnt = 6;  //
QStringList columID = {"" , "" , "" , "(ms)" , "AutoLock", ""};  //
ui->FilePageHandle->setColumnCount(columnCnt);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->setRowCount(lineCnt);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(columID);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->verticalHeader()->setVisible(false); // header
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(false); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::DoubleClicked);  //
/*  */
ui->FilePageHandle->setColumnWidth(0,200); //
ui->FilePageHandle->setFont(QFont("Helvetica"));  //
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);  //
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setFixedHeight(30);//
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalHeader()->setStyleSheet("QHeaderView::section{background:white;color:black;}");  //
/*  */
ui->FilePageHandle->horizontalScrollBar()->setStyleSheet(
	 "QScrollBar:horizontal{background:#DADADA;height:25px;margin-left:25px;margin-right:25px }"
	 "QScrollBar::handle:horizontal{background:lightgray;min-height:80px;height:25px}"
	 "QScrollBar::sub-line:horizontal{width:25px;subcontrol-position:left;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 "QScrollBar::add-line:horizontal{width:25px;subcontrol-position:right;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 );
ui->FilePageHandle->verticalScrollBar()->setStyleSheet(
	 "QScrollBar{background:#DADADA;width:25px;margin-top:25px;margin-bottom:25px}"
	 "QScrollBar::handle:vertical{background:lightgray;min-height:80px;width:25px}"
	 "QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical{height:25px;subcontrol-position:top;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 "QScrollBar::add-line:vertical{height:25px;subcontrol-position:bottom;subcontrol-origin:margin;}"
	 );
```

    ```c++
    #include <iostream> 
    using namespace std;

    int main()
    {
        int a = 0x1234;
        //intchar,intchar,
        char c = (char)a;
        if (C == 0x12)
            cout << "big endian" << endl;
        else if(C == 0x34)
            cout << "little endian" << endl;

        return 0;
    }
    ```
2. union
    ```c++
    #include <iostream>
    using namespace std;
    //union, endian
    union endian
    {
        int a;
        char ch;
    };

    int main()
    {
        endian value;
        value.a =0x1234;
        //ach4
        if (value.ch ==0x12)
            cout << "big endian" << endl;
        else if (value.ch == 0x34)
            cout << "Tittle endian" << endl;
        
        return 0;
    }
    ```

****
	```c++
	//
	template<typename T>
	class Counter
	{
	private:
		//
		T *ptr;//
		int cnt; // 1
		//
		template<typename T>
		friend class SmartPtr;
		//
		Counter(T *p)
		{
			ptr =p;
			cnt = 1;
		}
		//
		~Counter()
		{
			delete ptr;
		}
	}
	```
****
	```c++
	template<typename T>
	class SmartPtr
	{
	private:
		//
		Counter<T> ptr_cnt;
	public:
		// 
		SmartPtr(T *p)
		{
			ptr_cnt = new Counter<T>(p);
		}
		//
		SmartPtr(const SmartPtr &other)
		{
			ptr_cnt = other.ptr_cnt;
			ptr_cnt->cnt++;
		}
		//
		SmartPtr &operator=(const SmartPtr &rhs)
		{
			ptr_cnt = rhs->ptr_cnt;
			rhs.ptr cnt->cnt++;
			ptr_cnt->cnt--;
			if (ptr_cnt->cnt == 0)
				delete ptr_cnt;
			return *this;
		}
		//
		T &operator*()
		{
			return *(ptr_cnt->cnt);
		}
		//
		~SmartPtr()
		{
			ptr_cnt->cnt--;
			if(ptr_cnt->cnt == 0){
				delete ptr_cnt;
			}else{
				cout << "" << ptr_cnt->cnt << "" << endl;
			}
		}
	}
	```

makefile
<!--more-->

# 1. makefile
Makefile 
"GNUmakefile" "makefile" "Makefile" 

```jsx
targets:prerequisites
	command
or
targets : prerequisites; command
	command
```
targets Object File
prerequisites targets 
commandmake  shell 
:Tab
```jsx
eg:
test:test.c
	gcc -o test test.c
```

# 2. makefile
Makefile 
1) 
 Makefile 
2) 
 make Makefile make 
3) 
 Makefile C Makefile 
4) 
 Makefile  MakefileC include 
 Makefile C #if 
5) 
Makefile  UNIX  Shell # C/C++ // Makefile #\#

# 3.
- *
0
```jsx
eg:
	.PHONY:clean
	clean:
		rm -rf *.o test*
```
- 
**
- []
* "[]" *
- %
***
```jsx
eg:
	test:test.o test1.o
		gcc -o $@ $^
	%.o:%.c
		gcc -o $@ $^
```
::"%.o"  ".o" 

# 4. 
- 
=VALUE_LIST = one two three
- 
"$(VALUE_LIST)" or "${VALUE_LIST}"
```jsx
eg:
	OBJ=main.o test.o test1.o test2.o
	test:$(OBJ)
		gcc -o test $(OBJ)
```
- 
 ( := ) 
```jsx
eg:
	x:=foo
	y:=$(x)b
	x:=new
	test
		@echo "y=>$(y)"
		@echo "x=>$(x)"
 shell make test:
	y=>foob
	x=>new	
```
 (  = ) 
```jsx
eg:
	x=foo
	y=$(x)b
	x=new
	test
		@echo "y=>$(y)"
		@echo "x=>$(x)"
 shell make test:	
	y=>newb
	x=>new
```
 ( ?= ) 
```jsx
eg:
	x:=foo
	y:=$(x)b
	x?=new
	test
		@echo "y=>$(y)"
		@echo "x=>$(x)"
	 shell make test:
		y=>foob
		x=>foo
```
 ( += ) 
```jsx
eg:
	x:=foo
	y:=$(x)b
	x+=$(y)
	test
		@echo "y=>$(y)"
		@echo "x=>$(x)"
	 shell make test:
		y=>foob
		x=>foo foob
```

# 5. VPATHvpath
- VPATH
VPATH Makefile 
```jsx
eg:
	VPATH := src
	
	VPATH := src car or VPATH := src:car
```
- vpath
vpath 
1) vpath PATTERN DIRECTORIES
```jsx
eg:
	vpath test.c src	# src  test.c
	
	vpath test.c src car or vpath test.c src : car
	#PATTERNDIRECTORIES
```
2) vpath PATTERN
```jsx
eg:
	vpath test.c	# test.c 
```
3) vpath
```jsx
eg:
	vpath
	#vpath 
```

# 6. 

$(<function>,<arguments>) or ${<function>,<arguments>}
function arguments
